cause.description:
Jenny has not been in Toronto for almost a year. She really misses it, but cannot afford to go back for a weeks visit. She needs 700 dollars to make it back, thats including the two-way flight. HELP A SISTA OUT!
1. Jenny misses her Toronto friends
2. Jenny's Toronto friends miss her
3. She needs a vacation from her parents
cause.mission: Get Jenny Reflux to Toronto for a visit
cause.name: Send Jenny To Toronto
